remarks:
Principle of identity.  Theorem *2.08 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 101.  For another version of the proof directly from axioms, see ~ id1 .  Its associated inference, ~ idi , requires no axioms for its proof, contrary to ~ id .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.)  (Proof shortened by Stefan Allan, 20-Mar-2006.)
